context.p: For each Xen server, follow this procedure:

li.p: Optionally, place an SSH key to your Xen server to allow the zenoss user from the server to log in as root without requiring further credentials.
Create the Xen server in the /Servers/Virtual Hosts/Xen device class.

note.p: If you have this server modeled already, remove the server and recreate it under the Xen device class. Do not move it.

li.p: Select the Guest menu and ensure that the guest hosts were found during the modeling process.
